name: European Partners for the Environment
goal:
- EPE stimulates collective intelligence on "new generation of partnerships" for sustainable development in a global, interconnected and interdependent world to design systemic tools, foster ‘radical collaboration’ in view of Resource Efficiency, Resilience, Equity & Just Transition, Well Being. EPE explores how to scale up partnerships best practices with 3 main objectives: massive change, systemic change, green-economy and good-life-for-all value chain partnerships.
- EPE facilitates ‘Forum’ with a ‘Community of Members’ (Organisations and Individuals) and ‘Strategic Partnerships’ with Privilege and Exclusive Partners to develop a ‘new generation of partnerships’ and to mobilize finance, economic actors and markets leverages.
- EPE helps to leverage the systemic role of multipliers representing purchasers, investors, standards setters, trust builders, facilitate dialogue between ‘the supply side’ and the ‘demand side’.
-EPE is partir of two blockchains initiatives respectively related to (i) inclusive and sustainable finance and (i) the SDGs.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Youth
